This vignette is meant for those who want to get the latest data from the Washington Post Github repo.

```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(waposchosh)
```

## Usage

Get latest data (if newer version is available)
```{r latest, message = FALSE}
latest <- latest_data()
tail(latest, 4)
```
